00016 #include "TTEScheduler.h"
00017 
00018 #include <SchedulerMessage_m.h>
00019 #include <SchedulerMessageEvents_m.h>
00020 
00021 namespace TTEthernetModel {
00022 
00023 Define_Module( TTEScheduler);
00024 
00025 simsignal_t TTEScheduler::currentDrift = SIMSIGNAL_NULL;
00026 simsignal_t TTEScheduler::newCycle = SIMSIGNAL_NULL;
00027 
00028 void TTEScheduler::initialize()
00029 {
00030     currentDrift = registerSignal("currentDrift");
00031     newCycle = registerSignal("newCycle");
00032     cycles = 0;
00033 
00034     //Start Timer
00035     scheduleAt(simTime(), new SchedulerEvent("NEW_CYCLE", NEW_CYCLE));
00036 
00037     lastCycleStart = simTime();
00038 }
00039 
00040 bool TTEScheduler::registerEvent(SchedulerEvent *event)
00041 {
00042 #ifdef DEBUG
00043     Enter_Method("registerEvent(SchedulerEvent %s)",event->getName());
00044 #else
00045     Enter_Method_Silent();
00046 #endif
00047     take(event);
00048     registredEvents.push_back(event);
00049     if (event->getKind() == ACTION_TIME_EVENT)
00050     {
00051         SchedulerActionTimeEvent *actionTimeEvent = (SchedulerActionTimeEvent*) event;
00052         //Check whether event is in cycle
00053         if(actionTimeEvent->getAction_time()>cycleTicks){
00054             bubble("Schedule contains out of cycle events!");
00055             return false;
00056         }
00057 
00058         if (actionTimeEvent->getAction_time() > getTicks())
00059         {
00060             scheduleAt(lastCycleStart + currentTick * actionTimeEvent->getAction_time(),
00061                     actionTimeEvent);
00062         }
00063         else
00064         {
00065             scheduleAt(lastCycleStart
00066                     + currentTick
00067                     * (actionTimeEvent->getAction_time() + cycleTicks),
00068                     actionTimeEvent);
00069 
00070         }
00071     }
00072     else if (event->getKind() == TIMER_EVENT)
00073     {
00074         SchedulerTimerEvent *timerEvent = (SchedulerTimerEvent*) event;
00075         scheduleAt(simTime() + currentTick * timerEvent->getTimer(), event);
00076     }
00077     return true;
00078 }
00079 
00080 void TTEScheduler::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00081 {
00082     if (msg->isSelfMessage() && (msg->getKind() == ACTION_TIME_EVENT || msg->getKind() == TIMER_EVENT))
00083     {
00084         SchedulerEvent *event = (SchedulerEvent*) msg;
00085         registredEvents.remove(event);
00086         sendDirect(event, event->getDestinationGate());
00087     }
00088     else if (msg->isSelfMessage() && msg->getKind() == NEW_CYCLE)
00089     {
00090         //First the precision is changed for the next cycle
00091         changeDrift();
00092 
00093         emit(newCycle, 1L);
00094         cycles++;
00095         lastCycleStart = simTime();
00096         lastCycleTicks += cycleTicks;
00097         scheduleAt(lastCycleStart + currentTick * cycleTicks, msg);
00098         newCyclemsg = msg;
00099 
00100 
00101         //WARNING: NOW IN DUMMYSYNC MODULE CHECK IF CORRECT!
00102         //TODO: Delete this code if simulation works properly
00103 //        int modticks = (int)(simTime().dbl()/tick)%cycleTicks;
00104 //        if(modticks>(cycleTicks/2))
00105 //            modticks=modticks-cycleTicks;
00106 //        modticks+=uniform(-0.000000250,0.000000250)/tick;
00107 //        clockCorrection(-modticks);
00108         correctEvents();
00109     }
00110 }
00111 
00112 void TTEScheduler::changeDrift(){
00113 
00114     double newDriftChange = uniform(-maxDriftChange,maxDriftChange);
00115     double newTick = currentTick+newDriftChange;
00116     if((newTick-tick)>maxDrift)
00117         par("current_tick").setDoubleValue(tick+maxDrift);
00118     else if((newTick-tick)<-maxDrift)
00119         par("current_tick").setDoubleValue(tick-maxDrift);
00120     else
00121         par("current_tick").setDoubleValue(newTick);
00122     emit(currentDrift, par("current_tick").doubleValue()-tick);
00123 }
00124 
00125 void TTEScheduler::correctEvents(){
00126     for(std::list<SchedulerEvent*>::const_iterator registredEvent = registredEvents.begin(); registredEvent != registredEvents.end(); registredEvent++){
00127         if((*registredEvent)->getKind() == ACTION_TIME_EVENT){
00128             SchedulerActionTimeEvent *actionTimeEvent = (SchedulerActionTimeEvent*)*registredEvent;
00129             cancelEvent(actionTimeEvent);
00130             //TODO lots of improvements!
00131             if (actionTimeEvent->getAction_time() > getTicks())
00132             {
00133                 scheduleAt(lastCycleStart + currentTick * actionTimeEvent->getAction_time(),
00134                         actionTimeEvent);
00135             }
00136             else if (actionTimeEvent->getAction_time() == getTicks())
00137             {
00138                 scheduleAt(simTime(), actionTimeEvent);
00139             }
00140             else
00141             {
00142                 if(lastCycleStart>simTime()){
00143                     scheduleAt(lastCycleStart
00144                                             + currentTick
00145                                             * (actionTimeEvent->getAction_time()),
00146                                             actionTimeEvent);
00147                 }
00148                 else{
00149                     scheduleAt(lastCycleStart
00150                                             + currentTick
00151                                             * (actionTimeEvent->getAction_time() + cycleTicks),
00152                                             actionTimeEvent);
00153                 }
00154             }
00155         }
00156     }
00157 }
00158 
00159 void TTEScheduler::handleParameterChange(const char* parname){
00160     maxDriftChange = par("max_drift_change").doubleValue();
00161     maxDrift = par("max_drift").doubleValue();
00162     currentTick = par("current_tick").doubleValue();
00163     tick = par("tick").doubleValue();
00164     cycleTicks = par("cycle_ticks").longValue();
00165 }
00166 
00167 void TTEScheduler::clockCorrection(int ticks){
00168     Enter_Method("clock correction %d ticks",ticks);
00169 
00170     lastCycleStart+=SimTime(ticks*currentTick);
00171 
00172     //Now correct the new cylce time
00173     cancelEvent(newCyclemsg);
00174     scheduleAt(simTime()-(simTime()-lastCycleStart) + currentTick * cycleTicks, newCyclemsg);
00175     //Now correct the events
00176     correctEvents();
00177 }
00178 
00179 unsigned int TTEScheduler::getTicks()
00180 {
00181     if(simTime() >= lastCycleStart){
00182         return round(((simTime() - lastCycleStart) / currentTick).dbl());
00183     }
00184     else{
00185         return cycleTicks - round(((lastCycleStart - simTime()) / currentTick).dbl());
00186     }
00187 }
00188 
00189 unsigned long TTEScheduler::getTotalTicks()
00190 {
00191     return lastCycleTicks + getTicks();
00192 }
00193 
00194 unsigned int TTEScheduler::getCycles()
00195 {
00196     return cycles;
00197 }
